main: ^To use your tendril, click and hold the <color=#00d8ff>Left Mouse Button</color>.
^When you grab an object, it will immediately start to follow your cursor.
^Release the button while the object is off of your cursor to flick the object in whatever direction it was going.
^If you want to release it softly, wait for the object to reach your cursor, then release the button.
^Try clearing the rocks in front of that doorway to continue.
